title: SnickerdoOH's:
description: Can a magical kiss be hot enough to melt? Rose is spending Christmas by herself but that's just great with her because she has a secret. Then Rose finds herself lost in The North Pole with no way to get back. Will a hot Santa and some Christmas magic just be what she needs to get home. This is a Red Riding Hood retelling meets Santa steamy short romance that will be sure to spice up your holiday.
author: Cherry Six
